metadata.description: Developer and System Administrator CLI tools - including cloud providers, version control, configuration management, and system utilities
metadata.source: Docker Hub, GitHub, and official tool registries
notes: Includes cloud provider CLIs, DevOps tools, language runtimes, and system utilities
Tools with official Docker images are prioritized
System utilities may use Alpine/BusyBox-based images

dev_tools.name: AWS CLI
dev_tools.description: Universal Command Line Interface for Amazon Web Services
dev_tools.notes: Requires AWS_PAGER= environment variable: docker run --rm -e AWS_PAGER= amazon/aws-cli help

dev_tools.name: Google Cloud SDK
dev_tools.description: Command-line interface for Google Cloud Platform services

dev_tools.name: Azure CLI
dev_tools.description: Command-line interface for Microsoft Azure
dev_tools.notes: Image from Microsoft Container Registry

dev_tools.name: Terraform
dev_tools.description: Infrastructure as Code tool for building, changing, and versioning infrastructure

dev_tools.name: Ansible
dev_tools.description: IT automation platform that makes your applications and systems easier to deploy

dev_tools.name: Docker
dev_tools.description: Platform for developing, shipping, and running applications in containers

dev_tools.name: Git
dev_tools.description: Distributed version control system

dev_tools.name: GitHub CLI
dev_tools.description: GitHub's official command line tool

dev_tools.name: GitLab CLI
dev_tools.description: GitLab CLI tool for working with GitLab from the command line

dev_tools.name: Node.js
dev_tools.description: JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine

dev_tools.name: Python
dev_tools.description: Python programming language interpreter

dev_tools.name: Go
dev_tools.description: Go programming language compiler and tools

dev_tools.name: Rust
dev_tools.description: Rust programming language compiler and tools

dev_tools.name: PHP
dev_tools.description: PHP programming language interpreter

dev_tools.name: Ruby
dev_tools.description: Ruby programming language interpreter

dev_tools.name: Java (OpenJDK)
dev_tools.description: Open-source implementation of the Java Platform

dev_tools.name: PostgreSQL
dev_tools.description: Powerful, open source object-relational database system

dev_tools.name: MySQL
dev_tools.description: Open-source relational database management system

dev_tools.name: Redis
dev_tools.description: In-memory data structure store, used as database, cache, and message broker

dev_tools.name: MongoDB
dev_tools.description: Source-available cross-platform document-oriented database

dev_tools.name: Jenkins
dev_tools.description: Open source automation server for CI/CD

dev_tools.name: GitLab Runner
dev_tools.description: Run your CI/CD jobs and send the results back to GitLab

dev_tools.name: Nginx
dev_tools.description: High-performance HTTP server and reverse proxy

dev_tools.name: Vault
dev_tools.description: Tool for secrets management, encryption as a service, and privileged access management

dev_tools.name: Consul
dev_tools.description: Service mesh solution providing service discovery, configuration, and segmentation

dev_tools.name: Packer
dev_tools.description: Tool for creating identical machine images for multiple platforms

dev_tools.name: DigitalOcean CLI
dev_tools.description: Command-line interface for the DigitalOcean API

dev_tools.name: Helm
dev_tools.description: Package manager for Kubernetes

dev_tools.name: kubectl
dev_tools.description: Command-line tool for controlling Kubernetes clusters

dev_tools.name: jq
dev_tools.description: Lightweight and flexible command-line JSON processor

dev_tools.name: yq
dev_tools.description: Command-line YAML, JSON and XML processor

dev_tools.name: curl
dev_tools.description: Command line tool for transferring data with URLs

dev_tools.name: wget
dev_tools.description: Network utility to retrieve files from the web

dev_tools.name: htop
dev_tools.description: Interactive process viewer for Unix systems
dev_tools.notes: Typically used on host system, not commonly containerized

dev_tools.name: tmux
dev_tools.description: Terminal multiplexer for Unix-like operating systems
dev_tools.notes: Typically used on host system, not commonly containerized

dev_tools.name: vim
dev_tools.description: Highly configurable text editor built to make creating and changing any kind of text very efficient
dev_tools.notes: Typically used on host system, not commonly containerized

dev_tools.name: Grafana
dev_tools.description: Open source analytics and interactive visualization web application

dev_tools.name: Elasticsearch
dev_tools.description: Distributed, RESTful search and analytics engine

dev_tools.name: Logstash
dev_tools.description: Server-side data processing pipeline

dev_tools.name: Kibana
dev_tools.description: Data visualization and exploration tool

dev_tools.name: MariaDB
dev_tools.description: Community-developed fork of MySQL

dev_tools.name: RabbitMQ
dev_tools.description: Open source message broker software

dev_tools.name: Memcached
dev_tools.description: High-performance, distributed memory object caching system

dev_tools.name: Traefik
dev_tools.description: Modern HTTP reverse proxy and load balancer

dev_tools.name: HAProxy
dev_tools.description: Reliable, high performance TCP/HTTP load balancer

dev_tools.name: Caddy
dev_tools.description: Fast, multi-platform web server with automatic HTTPS

dev_tools.name: Certbot
dev_tools.description: Tool to automatically use Let's Encrypt certificates

dev_tools.name: Bash
dev_tools.description: GNU Bourne Again Shell

dev_tools.name: Alpine Linux
dev_tools.description: Security-oriented, lightweight Linux distribution

dev_tools.name: Ubuntu
dev_tools.description: Debian-based Linux operating system

dev_tools.name: Debian
dev_tools.description: Free operating system based on the GNU/Linux kernel

dev_tools.name: Buildah
dev_tools.description: Tool that facilitates building OCI container images

dev_tools.name: Skopeo
dev_tools.description: Command line utility for various operations on container images and image repositories

dev_tools.name: Trivy
dev_tools.description: Comprehensive security scanner for vulnerabilities in containers

dev_tools.name: Grype
dev_tools.description: Vulnerability scanner for container images and filesystems

dev_tools.name: Syft
dev_tools.description: CLI tool and library for generating a Software Bill of Materials from container images

dev_tools.name: Dive
dev_tools.description: Tool for exploring a docker image, layer contents, and discovering ways to shrink size

dev_tools.name: Hadolint
dev_tools.description: Dockerfile linter, validate inline bash

dev_tools.name: act
dev_tools.description: Run your GitHub Actions locally

dev_tools.name: K9s
dev_tools.description: Kubernetes CLI to manage your clusters in style

dev_tools.name: Kustomize
dev_tools.description: Kubernetes native configuration management

dev_tools.name: Kubectx + Kubens
dev_tools.description: Faster way to switch between clusters and namespaces in kubectl
dev_tools.notes: Typically used on host system, shell scripts

dev_tools.name: Stern
dev_tools.description: Multi pod and container log tailing for Kubernetes
dev_tools.notes: Typically used as binary on host system

dev_tools.name: fzf
dev_tools.description: Command-line fuzzy finder
dev_tools.notes: Typically used on host system for shell integration

dev_tools.name: ripgrep
dev_tools.description: Line-oriented search tool that recursively searches the current directory
dev_tools.notes: Typically used on host system

dev_tools.name: bat
dev_tools.description: Cat clone with syntax highlighting and Git integration
dev_tools.notes: Typically used on host system

dev_tools.name: fd
dev_tools.description: Simple, fast and user-friendly alternative to find
dev_tools.notes: Typically used on host system

dev_tools.name: exa
dev_tools.description: Modern replacement for ls
dev_tools.notes: Typically used on host system, project archived

dev_tools.name: Zoxide
dev_tools.description: Smarter cd command for your terminal
dev_tools.notes: Typically used on host system for shell integration

dev_tools.name: HTTPie
dev_tools.description: Modern, user-friendly command-line HTTP client

dev_tools.name: lazydocker
dev_tools.description: Simple terminal UI for both docker and docker-compose

dev_tools.name: lazygit
dev_tools.description: Simple terminal UI for git commands
dev_tools.notes: Typically used on host system for Git integration

dev_tools.name: Minio
dev_tools.description: High performance object storage compatible with Amazon S3 APIs

dev_tools.name: Rclone
dev_tools.description: Command line program to manage files on cloud storage

dev_tools.name: Restic
dev_tools.description: Fast, secure, efficient backup program

dev_tools.name: borgbackup
dev_tools.description: Deduplicating archiver with compression and encryption
dev_tools.notes: No official Docker image, typically used on host system

dev_tools.name: Etcd
dev_tools.description: Distributed reliable key-value store

dev_tools.name: Nmap
dev_tools.description: Network exploration tool and security scanner

dev_tools.name: Wireshark (tshark)
dev_tools.description: Network protocol analyzer
dev_tools.notes: Typically used on host system, GUI application

dev_tools.name: Netcat
dev_tools.description: Networking utility for reading and writing network connections
dev_tools.notes: Included in most base images (Alpine, Ubuntu, etc.)

dev_tools.name: OpenSSH
dev_tools.description: Secure Shell connectivity tools
dev_tools.notes: Using Alpine Linux which includes OpenSSH client

dev_tools.name: OpenSSL
dev_tools.description: Toolkit for SSL/TLS protocols
dev_tools.notes: Included in most base images

dev_tools.name: Sqlmap
dev_tools.description: Automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool

dev_tools.name: Nuclei
dev_tools.description: Fast vulnerability scanner based on simple YAML templates

dev_tools.name: Subfinder
dev_tools.description: Subdomain discovery tool

dev_tools.name: Dasel
dev_tools.description: Query and update data structures from the command line

dev_tools.name: Crane
dev_tools.description: Tool for interacting with remote images and registries

dev_tools.name: Cosign
dev_tools.description: Container signing and verification tool

dev_tools.name: Loki
dev_tools.description: Log aggregation system designed to be cost effective and easy to operate

dev_tools.name: Promtail
dev_tools.description: Agent which ships the contents of local logs to a Loki instance

dev_tools.name: Benthos
dev_tools.description: Stream processor for mundane tasks

dev_tools.name: Gomplate
dev_tools.description: Template renderer supporting many datasources and template engines

dev_tools.name: Terraform-docs
dev_tools.description: Generate documentation from Terraform modules

dev_tools.name: Tflint
dev_tools.description: Terraform linter focused on possible errors, best practices, etc.

dev_tools.name: Terragrunt
dev_tools.description: Thin wrapper for Terraform that provides extra tools for keeping configurations DRY

dev_tools.name: Checkov
dev_tools.description: Static code analysis tool for infrastructure as code

dev_tools.name: Tfsec
dev_tools.description: Security scanner for your Terraform code

dev_tools.name: Infracost
dev_tools.description: Cloud cost estimates for Terraform in pull requests

dev_tools.name: Pulumi
dev_tools.description: Infrastructure as Code SDK using general-purpose programming languages
dev_tools.notes: Help command may require extended timeout (30s+) due to initialization
